description: For exchange student Adonis Cole, learning the ropes in America means dealing with Johnny Hill's handsy little step-brother, Elliott Finn. Elliott has a bit of a history getting a little too fresh with the guys in the house, and Adonis certainly has a body worth groping, so one could hardly blame Elliott when he tries to cop a feel of Adonis' package. Johnny has to remind Elliott that not everyone gets down in such a family positive way, but Elliott tells him to let him decide for himself, and to Johnny's disbelief, it turns out that Adonis' curiosity extends to more than just American culture. Needing no more of an invite, Johnny and Elliott proceed to show Adonis a very special kind of hospitality, one that he'll surely take home with him.Enjoy!
series: NDB - 5015 - Johnny Hill, Adonis Cole & Elliot Finn
title: Foreign Fuck
